item.title: Bootstrapping vs Funding – a tax arbitrage
item.description: Promoters of businesses to professional investors, now chase “growth” and increase valuations to sell their stake in the business instead of trying to earn profits and taking the earnings out through dividends — to save on taxes and earn more efficiently.
